    • 方法详细资料

      • getInstance

        public static DatabaseProxy getInstance()
        Get the Singleton instance of the DatabaseProxy
        返回:
        DatabaseProxy

      • checkValidCollection

        public void checkValidCollection​(java.lang.String collection)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Checks if a collection is valid in our database. Note that valid collections are hardcoded constants of this class.
        参数:
        collection - The collection string to be verified
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Collection is invalid

      • getData

        public void getData​(DatabaseCallback callback,
                    java.util.List<java.util.Map> list,
                    java.lang.String collection,
                    java.lang.String objectName,
                    java.lang.String sortField,
                    java.lang.String fieldIdentifier)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Get an array of documents from the database
        参数:
        callback - A DatabaseCallback used to run code after data has been fetched
        list - A list which will have fetched data appended to it
        collection - The collection to search in. May be one of [Player, QrCode, Location].
        objectName - (Optional) An object within the collection. May be null to return the entire collection.
        sortField - (Optional) A field within a Document that should be used for sorting. May be null to specify no sort order.
        fieldIdentifier - (Optional) Specify a document field for which objectName will be matched with. Default="Identifier".
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception if collection is invalid.

      • getData

        public void getData​(DatabaseCallback callback,
                    java.util.List<java.util.Map> list,
                    java.lang.String collection,
                    java.lang.String objectName)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

        public void getData​(DatabaseCallback callback,
                    java.util.List<java.util.Map> list,
                    java.lang.String collection)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • writeData

        public void writeData​(java.lang.String collection,
                      java.lang.String objectName,
                      java.util.HashMap data,
                      java.lang.Boolean overwrite)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Write data to an object in a collection
        参数:
        collection - The collection to search in. May be one of [Player, QrCode, Location].
        objectName - An object within the collection. May be null to return the collection.
        data - A map containing the attributes of an object.
        overwrite - A boolean flag if the provided data should truncate and overwrite all attributes.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception if collection is invalid.

      • writeData

        public void writeData​(java.lang.String collection,
                      java.lang.String objectName,
                      java.util.HashMap data)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • deleteData

        public void deleteData​(java.lang.String collection,
                       java.lang.String objectName)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Delete a document from a collection
        参数:
        collection - The collection to search in. May be one of [Player, QrCode, Location].
        objectName - An object within the collection. Must be specified.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception if collection is invalid or objectName is null.
